name: AmdocsHomeSecurity
0:
”Alexa, ask Home Security arm away”
”Alexa, ask Home Security read arm system status for partition one”
”Alexa, ask Home Security disarm with code 1234”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home security
des:
With Amdocs Home Security, you don’t need any more to find your keyfob or mobile app for setting or unsetting your system. Just ask Alexa.

This skill requires a security alarm system powered by Amdocs interactive services. First thing is to click on the top right corner of this page and link you amazon Alexa account with your Amdocs connected Home account.

Example of voice commands include:
a. “Alexa, ask Home Security read alarm system status”
b. “Alexa, ask Home Security set total alarm”
c. “Alexa, ask Home Security set total alarm for <partition name>”
d. “Alexa, ask Home Security set partial alarm”
e. “Alexa, ask Home Security set partial alarm for <partition name>”
f. “Alexa, ask Home Security unset alarm with code <PIN>”
g. “Alexa, ask Home Security unset alarm for partition name with code <PIN>”
